title: (x) Pearl Moon Boutique - Futura {Yves}
content:
Last one for now..   
   
Looks like a font for a boutique/salon. Really skinny.. clean design   
   
 ![Skinny clean boutique font](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121091051im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/49236.jpg)

 [‹ (x) The Crown Publishing Group - Mrs. Eaves {Massimo Nardini (self)}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121091051/http:/www.typophile.com/node/6731 "Go to previous forum topic") [Pr ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121091051/http:/www.typophile.com/node/6728 "Go to next forum topic")
author: arcanegel

comments.content:
Yves:   
   
Well.. yeah.. of course.. I mean.. I saw it immediately and everything.. I was just testing the skills..   
   
... i'll shut up now.   
   
For someone who's just getting in this.. you guys are just amazing. As soon as I sort out the paypal thing.. consider me a member..   
   
or rather a fan.   
   
Thanks again.   
rc

Hehe, Rafael, I didn't mean it that way, I was just "talking to   
myself" out loud. Should've added a smiley ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121091051im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif) Glad I could   
help you out.
